name: GoB 2020 - One Last GoB (Character/Class Based Multiplayer Shooter)(Counter Cringe/Fandom Offensive)
name_original: GoB 2020 - One Last GoB (Character/Class Based Multiplayer Shooter)(Counter Cringe/Fandom Offensive)
description:
GoB 2020 is primarily a character/class-based multiplayer first and third-person shooter. The game features over 25 characters/skins with over a hundred weapons and 36 maps!

GoB has been in development for 4 years, starting as far back as August 2016. Since then it has grown to be a massive multiplayer fan game featuring many characters and themes based on recommendations from friends and peers over that time.

GoB 2020 also features a rank system, that allows you to earn characters and skins through ranking up! This is achieved by getting kills and completing events. (Just make sure to not include any spaces in your username or it won't appear on the global leaderboards!)

Additionally, the game has a short campaign, as well as training modes, and a memoir from the developer recounting the last 4 years of development.
